articles.author: Tracy Swartz
articles.title: 'Western diet' may raise risk of early-onset colorectal cancer - New York Post
articles.description: Researchers presented their findings over the weekend at the annual meeting of the American Society of Clinical Oncology in Chicago.
articles.content: Colorectal cancer in young adults is on the rise now, scientists are examining how diets high in fat and low in fiber can spur changes in the digestive system that raise the risk for early-onset colo… [+2407 chars]
